text: Shito yo, anata gata no shuchu ni aru horyo-tachi ni itte yaru ga i. `Moshi arra ga, anata gata no kokoronouchi ni nanika yoimono ga aru koto o mitome rarereba, anata gataga bosshu sa reta mono yori mo sugureta mono o atae, mata anata gata o yurusa reru. Arra wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru
